mapper.select:
select TP_CGAUTHORITY.C_ENABLED , TP_CGAUTHORITY.C_ITEMDES , TP_CGAUTHORITY.C_SUBITEMDES , TP_CGAUTHORITY.C_SUBITEMID
from TP_CGAUTHORITY WHERE 1=1 AND TP_CGAUTHORITY.C_SUBITEMDES IS NOT NULL AND TP_CGAUTHORITY.C_SUBITEMID IS NOT NULL
AND TP_CGAUTHORITY.C_ENABLED like '' || #{cEnabled,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || ''
AND TP_CGAUTHORITY.C_ITEMDES like '' || #{cItemdes,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || ''

select TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_TRANSWAY, TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_CLUDECOM, TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_CLUDETIME, TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_CONLINE, TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_CONMONEY, TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_CONNUM, TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_CREATER, TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_CREATETIME, TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_FORINLAND, TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_FOROUTLAND, TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_ID, TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_GETTIME, TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_MODIFIER, TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_MODIFYTIME, TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_ORMTID, TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_ORSTID, TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_CLUDEADDR, TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_TIMESTAMP, TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_SIGNSTEP, TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_STATE, TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_SUPPLIER, TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_REMARK, TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_PAYWAY, TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_DR, TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_SW01, TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_SW02, TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_SW04, TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_SW03, TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_SW05, TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_SW09, TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_SW10, TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_SW11, TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_SW12, TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_CHECKWAY
from TP_CGCONTRACTMT WHERE 1=1 AND TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_SIGNSTEP = '0' AND TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_CONMONEY IS NOT NULL
AND TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_CONLINE like '%' || #{cgH002M1s1.cConline,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_CONNUM like '%' || #{cgH002M1s1.cConnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_SUPPLIER like '%' || #{cgH002M1s1.cSupplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND TP_CGCONTRACTMT.C_SW10 like '%' || #{cgH002M1s1.cSw10,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'

select TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_SW05 , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_ARRALLYORN , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_ARRGOODSEX , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_TIMESTAMP , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_SUMPRICE , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_STATE , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_SPEC , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_RESIDUENUM , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_REMARK , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_PRICE , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_ORID , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_MTID , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_MODIFYTIME , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_MODIFIER , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_ID , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_GROUDTOTALNUM , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_GOODSNUM , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_GOODSNAME , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_DR , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_CREATETIME , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_CREATER , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_CONNUM , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_CONLINE , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_CHECKYORN , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_BEFOREARRTIME , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_UNIT , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_ARRGOODSTIME , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_QUADEALLINE , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_GOODSCASE
from TP_CGCONTRACTST WHERE 1=1
AND TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_MTID like '' || #{cgH002S1s2.cId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || ''

select TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_ARRALLYORN , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_ARRGOODSEX , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_TIMESTAMP , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_SUMPRICE , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_STATE , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_SPEC , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_RESIDUENUM , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_REMARK , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_PRICE , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_ORID , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_MTID , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_MODIFYTIME , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_MODIFIER , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_ID , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_GROUDTOTALNUM , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_GOODSNUM , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_GOODSNAME , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_DR , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_CREATETIME , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_CREATER , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_CONNUM , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_CONLINE , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_CHECKYORN , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_BEFOREARRTIME , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_UNIT , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_ARRGOODSTIME , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_QUADEALLINE , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_SW05 , TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_GOODSCASE
from TP_CGCONTRACTST WHERE
AND TP_CGCONTRACTST.C_MTID like '' || #{cgH002S1s2.cMtid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || ''

select TP_CGMONEYBOOK.C_SW05 , TP_CGMONEYBOOK.C_BEFOREARRTIME , TP_CGMONEYBOOK.C_SUPPLIER , TP_CGMONEYBOOK.C_STATE , TP_CGMONEYBOOK.C_RETHINGS , TP_CGMONEYBOOK.C_REMONEY , TP_CGMONEYBOOK.C_REMARK , TP_CGMONEYBOOK.C_PAYTIME , TP_CGMONEYBOOK.C_ORMAN , TP_CGMONEYBOOK.C_MODIFYTIME , TP_CGMONEYBOOK.C_MODIFIER , TP_CGMONEYBOOK.C_INVOICE , TP_CGMONEYBOOK.C_ID , TP_CGMONEYBOOK.C_GETTIME , TP_CGMONEYBOOK.C_DR , TP_CGMONEYBOOK.C_DAYS , TP_CGMONEYBOOK.C_CREATER , TP_CGMONEYBOOK.C_CONSTID , TP_CGMONEYBOOK.C_CONNUM , TP_CGMONEYBOOK.C_CONMTID , TP_CGMONEYBOOK.C_CONLINE , TP_CGMONEYBOOK.C_CLEARMONEY , TP_CGMONEYBOOK.C_TIMESTAMP , TP_CGMONEYBOOK.C_CREATETIME
from TP_CGMONEYBOOK WHERE 1=1
AND TP_CGMONEYBOOK.C_CONMTID like '' || #{cgH002S2s3.cConstid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || ''

update.foreach:
update TP_CGMONEYBOOK
C_SW05 = #{item.cSw05,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_BEFOREARRTIME = #{item.cBeforearrtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
C_MODIFIER = #{item.cModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_MODIFYTIME = #{item.cModifytime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_STATE = #{item.cState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_RETHINGS = #{item.cRethings,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_REMONEY = #{item.cRemoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_REMARK = #{item.cRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_PAYTIME = #{item.cPaytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
C_ORMAN = #{item.cOrman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_INVOICE = #{item.cInvoice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_ID = #{item.cId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_GETTIME = #{item.cGettime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
C_DAYS = #{item.cDays,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_CONNUM = #{item.cConnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_CONLINE = #{item.cConline,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_CLEARMONEY = #{item.cClearmoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_ARRGOODSEX = #{item.cArrgoodsex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
WHERE C_ID = #{item.cId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
